data.name: What are the numbers?
data.description:
Suppose all numbers from 2 to 99 are placed in a hat. Two numbers are randomly drawn and Peter is told the product of the two numbers, and Simon the sum. 

Peter turns to Simon and says:

"I don’t know what the two numbers are."

Simon: "I knew you didn’t. Neither did I."

Peter: "I do now."

Simon: "So do I."

Write an SQL query to figure out the two numbers drawn from the hat. You are given a table, ``` nums_in_hat``` which contains one column, ```num```, with the numbers 2 - 99.

There is only one correct pair and your answer should be in the format 
```sql
  x   |   y
------+------
  n   |   n
```

Where x > y.

Bonus marks for producing a solution which shows how you worked it out rather than just selecting the answer.  Good luck!
